mdRecord.dcterms:title: Memoirs of a Huguenot family / tr. and comp. from the original autobiography of Rev. James Fontaine, and other family manuscripts; comprising an original journal of travels in Virginia, New York, etc., in 1715 and 1716. By Ann Maury. With an appendix containing a translation of the Edict of Nantes, the Edict of revocation, and other interesting historical documents. Reprinted from the original edition of 1852
